animeTitle: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai.: SD Chara ni Yoru Short Movie
otherNames: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai. Short Anime Specials, OreImo Season 2 Short Anime Specials, 俺の妹がこんなに可愛いわけがない。SDキャラによるショートムービー
synopsis: Short specials featuring chibi versions of OreImo characters, included on the first limited editions of the OreImo Season 2 BD/DVD volumes.
